About Me ...

Details

I graduated from MIT College of Engineering, Pune(2016) with a degree in Mechanical Engineering and am pursuing my Masters in Robotics from the University of Maryland at College Park.

Graduate Student with an extensive hands-on practical experience and interest in Robotics Systems development, SLAM , robotics motion planning, and controls. Passionate about technologies having real-world, large scale impact on society and proficient at conducting research. Along with technical know-how, possessing stellar communication, problem-solving and analytical skills.
